column6: "WAKE TO NIGHTMARE" All will be revealed in this arc - including the identity of the man behind the sneering lips!  When Banner awakens in a post-apocalyptic future, his problems are just beginning.  The mastermind behind the plot that made him a fugitive has big plans for the Hulk.
